title: isaacdestruction2
author: isaacdestruction2
content: Hi guys, I'm new to bitcoin and would like around $50 worth. I can use any payment method that you want and I can send the money first. Trusted sellers only please, thanks.

comments.author: usdt2021x
comments.body: hello i can sell you btc you can use skrill?

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: I will tell you to make account in any exchange and deposit from bank direct to buy BTC after making your KYC verification. I don't really understand your payment method so the best deal is to go directly to exchange and buy with trust.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: isaacdestruction2 on June 04, 2022, 12:15:54 AMHi guys, I'm new to bitcoin and would like around $50 worth. I can use any payment method that you want and I can send the money first. Trusted sellers only please, thanks.If you can pay using any payment method, why not choose a famous platform like Binance, complete the identity verification and buy from there, the transaction will be better, easier and faster.But if you don't want to lose part of your money in fees, you can try P2P trading like localbitcoin.If the payment method is not reversible, you can ask users and you may find interest.
